attributes.action: Home Secretary to ban Trump from UK as it poses risk to order and security here.

attributes.background: Trump (POTUS) has made inflammatory and prejudicial statements on the basis of race and creed. These have been directed at people all over the world and also to those in the UK. He has spread racist words and videos and he has sought to undermine our elected Mayor and PM. He threatens peace in UK.
